subject: Baseball
Steroids
lead_paragraph: Rich Gossage was elected in his ninth year on the ballot while Jim Rice, Andre Dawson and Mark McGwire, a slugger who has been suspected of using steroids, fell short.
snippet: Rich Gossage was elected in his ninth year on the ballot while Jim Rice, Andre Dawson and Mark McGwire, a slugger who has been suspected of using steroids, fell short.
